evidence_assessment: lack of evidence linking the injury to service
new medical evidence suggested the injury was service-related
decision_reasoning: unreasonably concluded that the applicant's injury was not service-related
Board rejected new medical evidence without addressing credibility
application_details: applicant fell in a shower aboard a military ship during training
conclusion_outcome: application for judicial review is allowed
matter is referred back for reconsideration by a different panel
cause_of_action: disability pension claim due to injury during military service
procedure_followed: judicial review analyzed against legislative requirements and standards of review
